price: Wir sagten: „O Feuer, sei Kühlung und Unversehrtheit für Ibrahim.
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
